diff_hunk:
@@ -68,251 +68,7 @@ echo "$SWIG_PATH" > tensorflow/tools/swig/swig_path
 # Invoke python_config and set up symlinks to python includes
 (./util/python/python_config.sh --setup "$PYTHON_BIN_PATH";) || exit -1
 
-## Set up Cuda-related environment settings
-
-while [ "$TF_NEED_CUDA" == "" ]; do
body: So has seen on another case this local_config_cuda should be fetched but is not visible unless we build a dep of it. I'll try to download your repo later today to do more test on it.
